A Descent into Madness

A dim room, cluttered and tense.  
His thoughts spiral into chaos.  
“I’m losing my mind! What’s wrong with me?”  

---

A flash of realization strikes him.  
“Blood on my clothes? No!”  
“Check the pocket!”  

---

Relief washes over him.  
“My reason isn’t gone! Just fever!”  
“But the sock… it’s soaked!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist experiences a mental breakdown as he grapples with the consequences of his actions and the fear of being discovered.
